title: Pluto
brief_description: This compilation of classic Disney cartoons begins with a brief introductory history of Walt Disney’s famous original creation, Mickey Mouse, along with several early b&w cartoon excerpts. Then enjoy seven heart-warming adventures with everybody’s favourite cartoon dog, Pluto.
